DataElement.preferredName: Person Emotional Behavior-Related Disorder Questionnaire Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._Excessively affected by emotion._A specific behavioral problem that occurs in persistent patterns and characteristic clusters and that causes clinically significant impairment._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.
